value:
$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|I do love playing with children. Let's
see... Here. I'll toss this coin...$k$pIs it heads or tails, my dear? Tell
me.$k$p$WmMPID_幼少アクア,ch05_07_Aqua_F_Dreaming18,Face|I don't know.$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Now, now. The answer doesn't
matter, but do make a little effort.
We're trying to have fun here!$k$p$EFace|As you know, the coin has two sides:
heads and tails. Either result is
equally possible.$k$pBut let's say that we had thousands
and thousands of coins... Would they
all come up tails?$k$p$WmMPID_幼少アクア,ch05_07_Aqua_F_Dreaming18,Face|All of them? Of course not.$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|It would be an incredible coincidence,
wouldn't it? If it actually happened...
you might even call it a miracle.$k$pWhat about if we tossed them again
and again...and again and again and
again?$k$pEventually, they might all come up
tails, might they not?$k$p$WmMPID_幼少アクア,ch05_07_Aqua_F_Dreaming18,Face|I guess so. Eventually. But the
number of times you'd have to
flip them...$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|Ah, but if you had infinite time, then
you'd be able to try an infinite
number of times!$k$pAnd if you try something an infinite
number of times, then a miracle
will occur...sooner or later.$k$p$WmMPID_幼少アクア,ch05_07_Aqua_F_Dreaming18,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|You, cocooned away inside your
current self, growing peacefully...$k$pI would call that a miracle.$k$pHow many times would the coins
have to come up tails to satisfy you?$k$pOnce might not be enough for you, I
know. But we're talking about time
stretching out to infinity...$k$pIt would happen again and again
and again...$k$pAnd in the future, more and more of
you might come to exist...an infinite
number of you.$k$p$WmMPID_幼少アクア,ch05_07_Aqua_F_Dreaming18,Face|Who says that time is infinite? The
world could end.$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|Hee-hee. What you say is true.$k$pBut this world contains an infinite
number of worlds within it...$k$pAnd if the world has no bounds,
we can toss coins for eternity.$k$p

$WmMPID_アクア,ch05_07_Aqua_F_Normal,Face|When I was a child...things were not
good for me. I felt...trapped.$k$pThere was no safe haven for me,
and I expected that my whole life
would be lived that way...$k$pI did not understand why life was
worth living.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Azura...$k$p$WmMPID_アクア,ch05_07_Aqua_F_Normal,Face|Deep inside my heart...I wanted to
run from it all. And then I had a
dream...$k$pBrothers and sisters who stood up
for me, friends who understood
my pain...$k$pEveryone could feel what I was going
through. Life was suddenly easy.$k$pThat world I wished for...I think we
might be there right now.$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_夢カミラ,ch05_28_Camilla_F_Dreaming18,Face|We must retreat for now. Oh, my
sweet Azura, I apologize.$k$p$WmMPID_アクア,ch05_07_Aqua_F_Normal,Face|Azura? It is as I suspected. This
world is the world of my dreams.
I must put an end to it.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Azura! Wait for us! We'll go with
you!$k$p$Sbs150|
